License information

Joda-Time source code is released under the business-friendly Apache 2.0 license. This is the same license as Ant, Spring, Tomcat and Jakarta.

The Hibernate support contributed library depends on Hibernate. Hibernate is LGPL v2.1 licensed. As a user of this library you must decide how the LGPL applies to you.

As is normal with the Apache 2.0 license, a NOTICE file exists for Joda-Time-Hibernate: 

=============================================================================
= NOTICE file corresponding to section 4d of the Apache License Version 2.0 =
=============================================================================
This product includes software developed by
Joda.org (http://www.joda.org/).
Copyright © 2005–2015 Joda.org. All rights reserved.
